context: Duolingo, Inc. is a language learning platform focused on gamified language education and certification testing. Leading language app. Math and music learning expansion.

competitors.name: Rosetta Stone
competitors.notes: Best overall Duolingo alternative, offering comprehensive language learning solutions

competitors.name: Babbel
competitors.notes: Most academic alternative with CEFR-aligned curriculum designed by linguistic experts, focuses on real-life dialogues for adult learners

competitors.name: Busuu
competitors.notes: Integrates human interaction with native speaker community for practicing writing and speaking exercises

competitors.name: Memrise
competitors.notes: Offers courses with native speaker videos, AI feedback for pronunciation practice, and multilingual phrasebooks

competitors.name: italki
competitors.notes: Community marketplace connecting learners with native teachers for personalized online 1-on-1 lessons

competitors.name: Cambly
competitors.notes: Specializes in online English tutoring with native English-speaking tutors, offers personalized lessons and group sessions

competitors.name: Mondly
competitors.notes: Owned by Pearson, offers lifetime access sales model

competitors.name: AI-powered language learning apps
competitors.notes: Growing competitive threat from new AI-native applications entering the market
